data.title: Cossacks of the Kuban (1949)
data.meta_description: Watch Cossacks of the Kuban (1949) online with English subtitles. A Soviet film about love on the collective farms of the Kuban.
data.text:
In the steppes of the Kuban love is born on two collective farms while wheat is (enthusiastically) gathered. Galina, the energetic chairwoman of one of the two kolkhozes, vies with her male counterpart for the best harvest. At the same time Gordey, her rival, a former soldier, is (and has been for ages) in love with her. On her part, Dasha a collective farm worker, has heartbeat for a young technician of the competing kolkhozâ€¦
